utilities

Class Avoider

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • utilities.Avoider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Avoider
extends Thread
    Checks if the robot must avoid an object in its path and then does it Runs constantly and can interrupt other processes.
    Version:
    3.0

      • chooseOrientation

        private boolean chooseOrientation(double[] currPos)
        Choose rotation sense depending on current position and heading Decides direction to turn when object encountered
        Parameters:
        currPos - - X, Y, heading coordinates
        Returns:
        - true is counterclockwise, false is clockwise
